description:
exec: add LibPath similar to LookPath
src/pkg/exec/lp_unix.go: add the LibPath function to enable looking up libraries.
the rules differ enough for libraries that LookPath can't be used.
I no longer remember how to write this for Windows.

messages.text:
Hello golang-dev@googlegroups.com,

I'd like you to review this change to
https://go.googlecode.com/hg/

subject: code review 5252049: exec: add LibPath similar to LookPath
